Sharing our flagship research platform, DeepMind Lab, with the research community.

item.title: Service Worker, what are you?
item.description:
Service Worker, what are you?

In July 2015, I was sitting in a theater in Austin Texas attending JavaScript Conference. The person on the stage was Jake Archibald, who at the time I only knew as funny British chap who talk about bathroom matter üöΩ a lot. I later found out he is kind of big deal‚Ñ¢ for designing Service Worker spec.

Measurement and training for artificial intelligence.

item.title: No title
item.description: The platonic ideal of a 21st-century company is a CEO and a computer. The computer hires a cloud of transient workers and the CEO pitches slides to investors.

item.title: I got a Google Home and finally understand the future of computing
item.description:
I got a Google Home and finally understand the future of computing

For decades the technology industry has been chasing the holy grail of computing: natural language conversation. Humans have always wanted to talk with computers like a real person, but for a long time, it's felt like a pipe dream. Research has stretched decades.

item.title: The Soil Depletion Crisis
item.description:
The Soil Depletion Crisis

The spectre of irreversible climate change looms large on the horizon. If warming exceeds 2¬∞C, the world will begin to hit 'tipping points', such as the permanent thawing of the Arctic permafrost, which is currently trapping more than double the total carbon in the earth's atmosphere.

item.title: Vim as IDE
item.description:
Vim as IDE

In Learn Vim Progressively I've show how Vim is great for editing text, and navigating in the same file (buffer). In this short article you'll see how I use Vim as an IDE. Mainly by using some great plugins.

item.title: SpaceX has a tentative return to flight date of December 16
item.description:
SpaceX has a tentative return to flight date of December 16

The satellite communications provider Iridium says it has a tentative launch date of December 16 for the first batch of its Iridium NEXT satellites, which would mark the return to flight for SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket. The company made the announcement Thursday morning on its website.

item.title: Rediscovering the iPad
item.description:
Rediscovering the iPad

It started with two unpleasant feelings: It‚Äôs not reliable anymore, and It needs too much babysitting. Harsh, but also fair. My beloved 2015 MacBook 12‚Äù, along with its complimentary 2016-model replacement, has been the source of conflicting emotions over the past year. A series of breakdowns on the controversy-stirring new keyboard, with week-long service times on each occasion. After more than two months, the 2016 replacement is behaving just fine, but still. My confidence in the machine has been damaged.

item.title: Logojoy
item.description:
Logojoy

Dawson Whitfield created an AI-powered logo creator that's 10x better than the competition and grew revenue to $15,000/mo in under a year. Here's how.
